column5: need recommendations for a guide in the Red Gut bay area of Rainy Lake. Fishing in early August. thanks

Hugh, Red Gut Bay on Rainy Lake isn't that big of an area. I can help you out with some areas you should try. But if you need a guide and if you wanna use your own boat, I could be available. Let me know.
Harvey, Any areas you could suggest would be appreciated. thanks
